name: AS_GSS_CRD_relatedEvaluationDetails
description: Card used to display minor details about a Evaluation in the context of a related record
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!showEvaluationLink: rule!AS_GSS_APPREF_GCW_LOGIC_displayRelatedEvaluationVisibilty(),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
    contents: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideLayout"(
        items: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
            item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
              labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
              value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: rule!AS_GSS_UT_displayEvaluationRecordTitle(
                  evaluationNumber: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationNumber],
                  evaluationTitle: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationTitle]
                ),
                style: "STRONG"
              )
            )
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
            item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
              labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
              value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
                icon: "external-link",
                caption: "Opens in a new tab",

              ),

            ),
            width: "MINIMIZE",
            showWhen: local!showEvaluationLink
          )
        },
        marginBelow: "EVEN_LESS"
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
        labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
        value: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
            icon: "calendar-o",
            caption: "Date Created",
            color: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
              brandingKey: "GrayThree",
              useSuiteBranding: true
            )
          ),
          " ",
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
            text: datetext(
              ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.createdDatetime],
              "MMM dd, YYYY"
            ),
            color: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
              brandingKey: "GrayThree",
              useSuiteBranding: true
            )
          )
        }
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_tagField"(
        labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
        tags: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_tagItem_v1"(
          text: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationStatus.refLabel],
          backgroundColor: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
            brandingKey: a!match(
              value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationStatus.refDataId],
              equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_INPROGRESS,
              then: "GrayOne",
              equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP,
              then: "BlueOne",
              equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_COMPLETE,
              then: "GreenOne",
              equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_AWARDEES_SELECTED,
              then: "PurpleOne",
              default: null
            ),
            useSuiteBranding: true
          ),
          textColor: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
            brandingKey: a!match(
              value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationStatus.refDataId],
              equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_INPROGRESS,
              then: "GrayFour",
              equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP,
              then: "BlueTwo",
              equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_COMPLETE,
              then: "GreenFour",
              equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_AWARDEES_SELECTED,
              then: "PurpleFour",
              default: null
            ),
            useSuiteBranding: true
          )
        ),
        size: "SMALL",

      )
    },
    link: rule!AS_GSS_CO_DSP_primaryRecordListField(
      returnLinkComponent: true,
      recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD,
      recordIdentifier: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_RECORD.evaluationId],
      newTab: true,
      siteWebAddressIdentifier: cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_TEXT_WEB_ADDRESS_IDENTIFIER,
      showLink: local!showEvaluationLink,
      sitePage: cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_TEXT_SITE_PAGE_EVALUATION
    ),
    shape: "SEMI_ROUNDED",
    showBorder: false,
    showShadow: true,
    padding: "STANDARD",
    marginBelow: "STANDARD"
  )
)
